OUR STORY
Post and Vine is managed by two brothers united by a shared passion for hospitality and a love for creating memorable dining experiences. After working in the restaurant industry for the last 15 years, Michael and J.D. Juterbock have brought their expertise to Vero Beach. Their mission is to provide a dining experience where guests can enjoy a thoughtfully crafted menu in a dog friendly inviting atmosphere that reflects the charm of the area. Located in the heart of downtown Vero Beach, featuring a covered open dining area, surrounded by lush greenery and vibrant flowers, Post and Vine is designed to be a place where great food, good company, and the beauty of Vero Beach come together.
J.D. & Mike Juterbock
Our Menu
To ensure we continue providing excellent service to all of our customers, we are introducing a 2-hour dining policy. This change will help us accommodate more guests and maintain a smooth, enjoyable dining experience for everyone.
